creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: standing woman with hair in an updo with ornaments, wearing a kimono with maroon, blue and black dragon and cloud designs and black lacquered geta; woman wears wide black obi with blue flowers; woman holds folded white cloth in her PL hand; boy attendant peers out from behind woman; boy wears light blue kimono with fan design and Daruma netsuke (?); mount has pattern of blue, green and orange leaves and white branches on orange brocade with tie-dye elements and appliqued and some areas of gold metallic stitching
title: Kamigata Beauty
